A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The visuals in this movie are amazing but that is where the good ends. The screenplay is poorly written\, instead of getting one good \"A\" plot you get about four \"C\" plots that don't result in an overall satisfying story. Entire parts of the movie could be cut with no change to the overall plot which leaves the viewer asking \"Is this movie almost over?\" about 2 hours into this 2.5 hour long movie.
